attributes.action: recognise the valuable contribution of the work of those who were involved in requests for details about MPs' expences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it had not been for the determined efforts of the people who requested the information on MPs' expences, this matter would never have come to the attention of the wider public. Those who made the requests should be acknowledged, and thanked by the Prime Minister, for the valuable work they have done to make our political represenatives more accountable to the people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
